<entry name="BombardmentDescription" value=""Some religious fanatics still fear the gods striking from the heavens. While we will not dub ourselves gods for inventing such powers, it might instill fear into those brainless lunatics."
-- Admiral James Heid, The Callisto Conflict
Orbital weaponry is neither cheap nor easy to manage. Yet the capability to strike foes anytime and anywhere can dramatically alter the outcome of any war."/> <entry name="BombardmentProperties" value="Operation
Deals 1 power of damage to all units in a territory
Ignores weapons of affected units"/>
<entry name="BlackHoleProperties" value="Operation
Deals 64 power of damage to all units and population in a territory and its neighbors
Ignores weapons of affected units
Destroys terrain features
Causes wasteland"/>
<entry name="DropPodProperties" value="Operation
Not deployed directly, but consumed when a unit performs an orbital deployment"/>
<entry name="EMPBeamProperties" value="Operation
Causes a blackout which fully disables a city for 5 turns"/>
<entry name="GrowthProperties" value="Operation
+4 growth in a city for 10 turns"/>
<entry name="NanoRobotsProperties" value="Operation
Fully repairs all units in a territory"/>
<entry name="NukeDescription" value="Nuclear reactions release vast quantities of energy from relatively small amounts of matter. Weaponized into small nuclear devices no larger than traditional bombs it can devastate entire cities by blast, fire and radiation.
Delivering nuclear payloads successfully is as important and costly as producing the nuclear devices themselves. With long range ballistic missiles we are now able to deliver these weapons of mass destruction to our enemies' doorstep.
Intellectuals have long been warning about a nuclear war resulting in mutually assured destruction."/> <entry name="NukeProperties" value="Operation
Deals 8 power of damage to all units and population in a territory
Ignores weapons of affected units
Destroys terrain features
Causes wasteland"/>
<entry name="PromotionProperties" value="Operation
+1 rank for all units in a territory below rank 5
Deals 40% health damage to units ranked up"/>
<entry name="ScanProperties" value="Operation
Reveals a territory and its neighbors for 1 turn"/>
<entry name="TeleportationProperties" value="Operation
Teleports all units from source to target territory"/>
